cleaned_text: More](/legal/terms-and-conditions#returns) Medical Description The Ubinext-LC tablet is a nutritional supplement with numerous health benefits. It consists of a combination of two active components namely, L-carnitine and ubidecarenone. L-carnitine is an amino acid that helps the body to produce energy. It is essential for the kidney, brain, heart and other body processes. Ubidecarenone is also known as Coenzyme Q10, can be used as a supplement in certain health conditions such as diabetes, heart problem, Parkinson's disease, hypertension, etc. Ubinext lc helps in supporting the health and boosting the regular activities for better physical health. It also helps in improving the recovery from physical exercises. It is recommended not to self medicate. Follow all the instructions given by your doctor before using the Ubinext-LC tablet. Before using this medicine, inform the doctor about your detailed medical history including all the medicines you are currently taking. Product Summary |Offer Mg)| Uses of UBINEXT LC STRIP OF 10 TABLETS - Ubinext-LC tablet helps in improving the over health. - It strengthens the immune system. - Promotes metabolism. - It can be used as an adjunct in certain medical conditions such as Parkinson's disease, age-related muscle weakness and impaired vision, diabetes and nerve damage due to diabetes, migraine, hypertension, diabetes, congestive heart failure, arthritis, breast cancer, etc.... Ingredients and Benefits of UBINEXT LC STRIP OF 10 TABLETS - The Ubinext-LC tablet contains L-carnitine L-Tartarate and Ubidecarenone as the main ingredients. - L-carnitine helps the body to produce energy for daily activities. It improves cardiovascular health. It promotes metabolism. It is essential for muscle movement, brain function and intensifies the immune system.... - Ubidecarenone, which is also known as Coenzyme Q 10, is a kind of vitamin that is usually present in the heart, liver, pancreas and kidney. It has anti-oxidant properties. It provides energy to the cells which are essential for the various chemical reaction in the body and the proper functioning of body organs.... Precautions and Warnings of UBINEXT LC STRIP OF 10 TABLETS Other General Warnings - You have an existing medical condition or a family history of a medical condition such as fits, high/low blood pressure, kidney disorder, over/underactive thyroid, etc. - You are on other medications, supplements or following other complementary or integrative health approaches. - You are allergic to any ingredients present in the Ubinext-LC tablet. - Dietary supplements are intended to supplement the diets of some people and should not be a substitute for a well-balanced, varied diet and healthy lifestyle. - You observe any unusual signs and symptoms while taking the Ubinext-LC tablet. - You are already under treatment with blood-thinning medications like warfarin, anti-cancer medicines and anti-hypertensive medicines. As it might reduce the effectiveness of these medicines if taken along.... - You are a pregnant or nursing woman. - It is advised to use this supplement cautiously if you are undergoing chemotherapy with certain medication. - It is suggested to stop this supplement at least two weeks ago before a scheduled surgery. As it might interfere with the blood pressure. Directions for Use of UBINEXT LC STRIP OF 10 TABLETS - Take the Ubinext-LC tablet two times a day or as directed by your doctor. - Swallow it as a whole with a glass of water, do not cut, break or chew the medicine. - It would be best if you take it at a fixed time for optimal results. - You should not consume vitamin supplements more than the stated recommended daily dose. Storage and disposal of UBINEXT LC STRIP OF 10 TABLETS - Store the Ubinext-LC tablet in a dry place, protected from light. - Keep it out of the reach of children and pets. Quick Tips of UBINEXT LC STRIP OF 10 TABLETS - Ubinext Lc tablet is a nutritional supplement. It has multiple health benefits in improving over health as promoting metabolism and strengthening the immune system. It is also used along with other medicine for health conditions such as diabetes, heart problem, Parkinson's disease, hypertension, etc. It is essential for the kidney, brain, heart and other body processes.... - Take this supplement as directed. Do not take more than the recommended daily dose. - Do not self-medicate. - Ubinext Lc tablet is intended to supplement the diets of some people and should not be a substitute for a well-balanced, varied diet and a healthy lifestyle. - Before starting this tablet, inform your doctor if you are pregnant, planning on becoming pregnant, or breastfeeding. - Along with this supplement, take a healthy diet enriched with essential nutrients, vitamins, and minerals. - Also, inform your doctor about all other medicines, and herbs that you take and your complete medical history.
